scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n VITE,ELECTRON -c "magenta,cyan" "npm --prefix ../frontend run dev" "wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:3000 && electron ."
scripts.pack: npm --prefix ../frontend run build:electron && npm run prepack:check && electron-builder --dir -c electron-builder.yml
scripts.dist: npm --prefix ../frontend run build:electron && npm run prepack:check && electron-builder -c electron-builder.yml
